key_points: MUST sign BAA with any AI vendor handling PHI
BAA is legally binding and requires vendor to maintain HIPAA compliance
Vendor must report any data breaches
Never use platforms that won't sign a BAA
messaging_examples: 100% HIPAA Compliant with Business Associate Agreement (BAA)
Fully HIPAA-compliant with signed BAA available
We sign BAAs with all healthcare clients - your patient data is protected

key_points: SOC 2 Type II certification demonstrates robust internal controls
Critical trust signal for enterprise healthcare organizations
Shows security, availability, confidentiality over time
Vanta Trust Center certification increasingly common
messaging_examples: SOC 2 Type II Certified - Enterprise-Grade Security
Vanta Trust Center Certified for Healthcare Compliance
Audited security controls meeting healthcare standards

key_points: End-to-end encryption (in transit and at rest)
Multi-factor authentication (MFA)
Role-based access control (RBAC)
Audit logging and full audit trails
Zero-retention modes for sensitive calls
No extended storage of PHI
messaging_examples: Zero-retention mode - sensitive calls never stored
Complete audit trails for every patient interaction
Role-based access ensures only authorized staff see PHI

key_points: 2025 HHS regulation: AI tools must be part of risk analysis
67% of healthcare orgs unprepared for 2025 stricter standards
Human oversight required - never auto-commit AI documentation to EHR
Edge computing/on-device processing minimizes PHI exposure
Federated learning trains models without centralizing patient data
messaging_examples: AI documentation requires physician review before EHR entry
On-device voice processing - patient data never leaves your network
Meets 2025 HHS AI risk analysis requirements
Federated learning - train AI without exposing patient data

key_points: Any recorded audio with health info + identifiers = PHI
Name, DOB, phone number make recordings HIPAA-protected
AI can only access PHI for explicitly permitted HIPAA purposes
Secure infrastructure (on-premises or HIPAA-compliant cloud)
messaging_examples: All call recordings secured as Protected Health Information (PHI)
Your Voice AI operates within HIPAA's permitted purposes
Choose on-premises or HIPAA-compliant cloud deployment
Patient identifiers protected at all times

features.name: 24/7 Appointment Scheduling
features.description: AI handles appointment booking, rescheduling, cancellations round-the-clock
features.practice_benefit: Never miss after-hours appointment requests (11% of calls come after-hours)

features.name: Smart Appointment Reminders
features.description: Automated voice, SMS, and email reminders with conversational rescheduling
features.patient_benefit: Never forget appointments with multi-channel reminders
features.roi_impact: $56K in recovered revenue from reduced no-shows (first month)

features.name: Waitlist Management
features.description: Automatically fills cancelled slots from waitlist
features.patient_benefit: Get earlier appointment if opening becomes available
features.practice_benefit: Maximize provider utilization, minimize empty slots

features.name: No-Show Recovery
features.description: AI follows up with no-show patients to reschedule
features.patient_benefit: Second chance to reschedule without judgment
features.practice_benefit: Recover lost appointments and maintain patient relationships

features.name: Real-Time Insurance Verification
features.description: AI checks eligibility across multiple clearinghouses in seconds
features.practice_benefit: Eliminate time-consuming phone calls to insurance companies
features.roi_impact: Nearly instantaneous vs. hours on hold

features.name: Insurance Information Collection
features.description: AI collects and updates insurance details during calls
features.patient_benefit: Update insurance over phone instead of arriving early

features.name: Payment Processing
features.description: Automated billing reminders and payment collection

features.name: Multi-Channel Communication
features.description: Calls, SMS, email handled by unified AI system

features.name: Multilingual Support
features.practice_benefit: Serve diverse patient populations without multilingual staff

features.name: After-Hours Call Handling
features.description: AI answers all calls outside business hours
features.patient_benefit: Always reach practice, never get voicemail
features.practice_benefit: Capture 11% of calls that come after-hours/weekends
features.roi_impact: 90% call answer rate (vs. 19% of call centers offering 24/7 service)

features.name: Prescription Refill Requests
features.description: AI collects refill requests and routes to pharmacy/provider
features.patient_benefit: Request refills by phone without waiting on hold
features.practice_benefit: Standardized refill process, reduced staff burden

features.name: Medical Triage
features.description: Conversational AI screens symptoms using clinically-approved flows
features.patient_benefit: Get right level of care faster
features.practice_benefit: Route urgent cases to medical staff immediately
features.roi_impact: 63% drop in average wait times, 47% reduction in abandoned calls

features.name: Patient Intake Automation
features.description: AI collects demographic, insurance, medical history before visit
features.patient_benefit: Spend less time on paperwork, more time with doctor
features.practice_benefit: Streamlined check-in, complete information before appointment

features.name: Clinical Documentation
features.description: Ambient AI listens to appointments and drafts clinical notes
features.patient_benefit: Doctor maintains eye contact during visit
features.practice_benefit: 72% reduction in documentation time, 30% less "pajama time"
features.roi_impact: $45K annual savings in staff costs, 7-20 minutes saved per encounter

features.name: Follow-Up Care Coordination
features.description: AI schedules follow-ups and sends care instructions
features.patient_benefit: Clear post-visit instructions and automatic follow-up scheduling
features.practice_benefit: Improved care continuity and patient outcomes

features.name: Emergency Call Routing
features.description: AI identifies urgent calls and routes immediately to on-call provider
features.patient_benefit: Emergencies handled within seconds, not minutes
features.practice_benefit: Protect on-call provider's personal phone number
features.roi_impact: Patients notified within 3 seconds during emergencies

features.name: Smart Call Routing
features.description: Dynamic routing to correct department or assigned provider
features.patient_benefit: Reach right person without being transferred multiple times
features.practice_benefit: Reduce call transfer frustration, improve first-call resolution
features.roi_impact: 45-50% of calls completely resolved without human intervention

features.name: Warm Transfer with Context
features.description: When human needed, AI transfers with full conversation context
features.practice_benefit: Staff receives context, can immediately help patient
features.roi_impact: Improved patient satisfaction and staff efficiency

Friction in buyer journey, may lose price-sensitive prospects

included_features: Custom AI training on practice protocols

capture_client_advantages.message: Unlike national providers, we understand Tennessee, Georgia, and the Southeast healthcare market. Local support team in your time zone.
Only AI receptionist provider that also handles your Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and SEO - complete growth solution.
Built for solo practitioners and small groups, not enterprise hospitals. No complex enterprise pricing.
AI handles routine calls, complex cases escalate to real humans - best of both worlds.
30-day money-back guarantee + 6-month no-show reduction guarantee or your money back.

objection_handling.response: Our AI is trained on millions of healthcare conversations and understands medical/dental terminology better than most human receptionists. We customize the AI to your specific specialty and can even train it on your practice's unique protocols.

objection_handling.objection: What if the AI makes a scheduling mistake?
objection_handling.response: Our system has 99.7% accuracy - higher than human receptionists. For added safety, all appointments sync in real-time with your EHR, and your staff can review/modify any booking before it's confirmed.

objection_handling.objection: My patients are older and prefer talking to humans
objection_handling.response: Studies show 78% of patients prefer 24/7 AI availability over business-hours-only human receptionists. Our AI is conversational and patient - many patients don't even realize they're talking to AI. Plus, complex cases still escalate to your team.

Absolutely. We're SOC 2 Type II certified, sign a BAA with every client, and use 256-bit encryption. Our compliance documentation is available for review, and many of our clients have passed HIPAA audits while using our system.

objection_handling.objection: We already have a receptionist - why do we need AI?
objection_handling.response: AI doesn't replace your receptionist - it makes them superhuman. Your receptionist can focus on complex patient needs while AI handles routine calls, after-hours inquiries, and overflow. Practices report staff are happier and less burned out.

objection_handling.objection: What if our EHR isn't supported?
objection_handling.response: We integrate with 20+ major EHRs including Epic, Cerner, Athena, and all major dental PMS systems. If yours isn't on the list yet, we can build custom integrations for Enterprise clients, or use universal APIs for appointment booking.

Most practices are live in under 5 business days. Our team handles the entire setup: EHR integration, call forwarding, AI training on your protocols, and staff training. You just need to provide access and answer a few questions about how you want calls handled.

objection_handling.objection: What happens if the AI doesn't understand a caller?
objection_handling.response: Our AI handles 45-50% of calls completely autonomously. When it encounters something unfamiliar, it smoothly transfers to your team with full context of what was already discussed - no patient frustration from repeating themselves.
